mapper.insert: insert into forget_to_clock_out_apply (id, PERSON_ID, DATA, TIME, EXPLAINS, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{time,jdbcType=BIT}, #{explains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update forget_to_clock_out_apply set PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA = #{data,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=BIT}, EXPLAINS = #{explains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, PERSON_ID, DATA, TIME, EXPLAINS, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from forget_to_clock_out_apply where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, PERSON_ID, DATA, TIME, EXPLAINS, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from forget_to_clock_out_apply

select id, PERSON_ID, DATA, TIME, EXPLAINS, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from forget_to_clock_out_apply where PERSON_ID = #{staffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and date_format(DATA,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{myDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
